Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Western
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Armitage, Damen and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Armitage, Damen and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
